law.catch_line: Except as otherwise provided in this title, each provision of this title applies whether the lessor ...
law.text: Except as otherwise provided in this title, each provision of this title applies whether the lessor or a third party has title to the goods, and whether the lessor, the lessee, or a third party has possession of the goods, notwithstanding any statute or rule of law that possession or the absence of possession is fraudulent.
